description:
Kululu`s latest machine has the ability to steal energy and make people into hopelessly unmotivated, sleepy individuals.  This seems like the perfect way to conquer the Earth!  Unfortunately, all does not quite go according to plan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Invasion par la paresse / Opération sauvetage soporifique
Keroro Shoutai Haru no Urara no Daisakusen de Arimasu / Fuyuki Damedame Hazard Kyuushutsusakusen de Arimasu
Lazy Days and Mondays Always Get Me Down
ケロロ小隊 春のうららの大作戦であります / 冬樹 ダメダメハザード救出作戦 であります
